0.1.name: wordpress/uptopromo
0.1.description: English Plugin UpToPromo is meant for the sale links in UpToPromo.com Features: 1. Register / Log in to UpToPromo.com. 2. Adding a site to the system. Choice of themes. 3. Automatic installation of the plugin and the rights to the UpToPromo folder. 4. Automatic adding UpToPromo code to your template site. 5. Viewing of the balance sheet and monthly income. 6. Payment order.
